# Overview

This folder contains the necessary scripts to reconstruct the main figures as well as associated supplementary figures in "A Systematic Evaluation of Single Cell RNA-Seq Analysis Pipelines" by Vieth et al. 2019, published in [Nature Communications](https://doi.org/10.1038/s41467-019-12266-7). 
There is also a version on [bioRxiv](https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/583013v1).
The input data is deposited on [zenodo](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3364467).
